title: Die Balance-Methode nach Dr. Tan - Akupunktur in Praxis
description: Der TCM-Kongress Rothenburg ist eine alljährlich stattfindende, nicht-kommer-zielle Veranstaltung der Arbeitsgemein-schaft für Klassische Akupunktur und TCM e. V.
text:
Tag 1
Learning Objectives
● Introduce participants to the discipline of Balance Method Acupuncture
● Explain the philosophy and practical applications of the Balance Method in the treatment of commonly seen conditions
● Provide insight on the use of Holographic Imaging Projection to enhance point prescriptions
● Explain diagnosis and treatment of difficult cases with the 12 Meridians acupuncture approach
● Demonstrate needling techniques and treatment strategies
Description
This full-day seminar will introduce participants to Dr Tan’s Balance Method acupuncture and its utility in addressing commonly seen conditions. Participants will be introduced to the philosophy and science of the Balance Method in treating causes and learn how to use meridians to both diagnose and treat imbalances.
Outline Day 1 May 18th, 2023
9AM- 10:00AM Introduction to Dr Tan’s Balance Method acupuncture
10:00 AM- 11:00 AM Overview of the 12 Meridians and Holographic image projections
11AM-11:15 AM 15 min break
11:15 AM-12:30 PM Diagnosing meridian imbalances and treating specific meridians to provide effective counterbalance
12:30PM- 3PM Lunch
3:00 PM-4PM Review, Questions and Answers
4:00 PM-5PM Case Studies
5:00 PM-5:15 PM 15 min break
5:15 PM-6:30 PM Demonstration and Self Practice
